messages.subject: Mibu gishi den news
messages.msgSnippet: This just in form my friend Michael who supplied us with the Shinsengumi filmography--
messages.messageBody:
This just in form my friend Michael who supplied us with the Shinsengumi
filmography--
<<<TARTAN UK have been bringing Asian films to the UK for years and now
are up and running in the U.S .So my favourite film of 2003 (When the
Last Sword is Drawn a/k/a/ Mibu gishi den is first up to be released in
theaters next month>>>

If this film shows up in your neck of the woods GO AND SEE IT!

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
